text:
You've heard of Nessie, now meet Morag, the monster of Loch Morar.
This large and elusive female is said to have attacked two fishermen in August 1969. They saw a creature described as around 30 ft long with rough brown skin, three large humps and a snake-like head. Loch Morar is even deeper than Loch Ness, more than 1000 ft in places.
